title: Shelter Managment System
description: This is a was a final project for my webtech class. This web app is a...
moredes: This is a was a final project for my webtech class. This web app is a shelter management system which allows pet lovers to adopt a pet after viewing it's description or pet owners to surrender their pets when they can't keep them anymore.

title: LifeLink
description: The is a project made to optimize blood and organ donation by creating a...
moredes: The is a project made to optimize blood and organ donation by creating a platform that connects donors and recipients more efficiently. The platform will allow donors to register their blood type and organ compatibility, along with their availability to donate. Recipients can register their blood type and organ compatibility, along with their urgent need for a donation.
